hero.headline: Altibbe — Innovation for Global Health Integrity
hero.subtext: We build systems that make trade truthful. From transparency reporting to AI policy intelligence, Altibbe partners with nations and producers to raise standards—quietly, rigorously, globally.

mission.title: Our Purpose & Principles
paragraphs: Health, trade, and trust are inseparable. Altibbe creates clarity in product information so citizens, agencies, and markets can act with confidence.
We blend modern science with practical wisdom—translating complex supply chains into clear, accessible data for decision-makers and consumers.
Integrity over noise; service over spectacle. Our systems are designed to be unbiased, efficient, and globally adaptable.

cards.title: Hedamo Report
cards.body: Structured, multilingual transparency reports for agencies and producers.

cards.title: Hedamo AI
cards.body: Intelligence for policy, import programs, and compliance planning.

cards.title: Hedamo Code
cards.body: QR-linked consumer clarity in every market.

governance.title: Governance, Data Care & Ethics
points: Data minimalism with strict handling standards.
Global adaptability to national goals and international norms.

items.text: Concept—clarity in product information as a public good.
Hedamo System—Report, AI, Code defined as one stack.
Pilot deployments—agency use-cases; consumer QR experiences.

leadershipNote.title: A Note from Our Founder
leadershipNote.quote: Altibbe began with a simple belief: truth should be effortless to find. Our task is to make good data usable—by ministries, by buyers, by families—so decisions are sound and dignity is preserved. We build with care, so others can lead with confidence.

alliances.title: Working With Institutions
alliances.copy: We collaborate with ministries, standards bodies, and nominated entities to localize Hedamo for national goals—food security, consumer protection, and export growth.

closingCta.headline: Bring Next-Generation Transparency to Your Nation
closingCta.subtext: Request a confidential briefing or explore a pilot tailored to your national objectives.
